amendment.description: Amendment strikes the preamble and inserts a new text.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the preamble and insert new language.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Royce amendment (A002) Agreed to without objection.
